content: {A打哈欠}I thought I could use it to simulate what it feels like to nap in the sky... All floofalicious and relaxing indeed, baa.
info: NPC星湾标签-喜爱标签4-12绵朵莉_12-绵朵莉

content: {A小害羞}That <style=Highlight>Fluffy Sky Plushie</style> from my furniture collection was inspired by the clouds, baa. One time, I dreamt that I was taking a nap in them...
info: NPC星湾标签-喜爱标签4-12绵朵莉_12-绵朵莉

content: I totally dozed off at the hot air balloon festival! So then, I took the big floppy ear from my dream and turned it into a lovely big plushie.
info: NPC星湾标签-喜爱标签4-12绵朵莉_12-绵朵莉

content: And I saw this "big ear" flapping and flopping... Turns out, it was a hot air balloon!
